1THESS 5.26 goljaiþ broþruns allans in gafrijonai weihai.
1THESS 5.27 biswara izwis in fraujin ei ussiggwaidau so aipistaule allaim þaim weiham broþrum.
1THESS 5.28 ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ izwis.
2THESS Incipit.0 Aipistaule Pawlaus du Þaissalauneikaium ·b· anastodeiþ.
2THESS 1.1 Pawlus jah Silbanus jah Teimauþaius aikklesjon Þaissalauneikaie in guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.
2THESS 1.2 ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.
2THESS 1.3 awiliudon skulum guda sinteino in izwara, broþrjus, swaswe wairþ ist, unte ufarwahseiþ galaubeins izwara jah managniþ friaþwa ainƕarjizuh allaize izwara in izwis misso;
2THESS 1.4 swaei weis silbans in izwis ƕopam in aikklesjom gudis in stiwitjis izwaris jah galaubeinais in allaim wrakjom izwaraim jah aglom þozei usþulaiþ,

2THESS 1.5 taikn garaihtaizos stauos gudis du wairþans briggan izwis þiudangardjos gudis, in þizozei jah þulaiþ; 2THESS 1.6 sweþauh jabai garaiht ist at guda usgildan þaim gaþreihandam izwis aggwiþa, 2THESS 1.7 jah izwis gaþulandam iusila miþ uns in andhuleinai fraujins unsaris Iesuis af himinam miþ aggilum mahtais is, 2THESS 1.8 in funins lauhmunjai gibandins fraweit ni kunnandam guþ jah ni ufhausjandam aiwaggeljon fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, 2THESS 1.9 þaiei fraweit usgiband, fralust aiweinon fram andwairþja fraujins jah fram wulþau mahtais is, 2THESS 1.10 þan qimiþ ushauhnan in þaim weiham seinaim, jah sildaleiknan in allaim þaim galaubjandam, unte galaubida ist weitwodei unsara du izwis in daga jainamma.

2THESS 1.11 du þammei jah bidjam sinteino bi izwis ei izwis wairþans briggai þizos laþonais guþ unsar jah fulljai alla leikain þiuþeinais seinaizos jah waurstw galaubeinais in mahtai, 2THESS 1.12 ei ushauhnai namo fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus in izwis jah jus in imma bi anstai gudis unsaris jah fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus.

2THESS 2.1 Aþþan bidjam izwis, broþrjus, in qumis fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus jah gaqumþais unsaraizos du imma, 2THESS 2.2 du ni sprauto wagjan izwis fram ahin nih drobnan, nih þairh ahman nih þairh waurda nih þairh aipistaulein swe þairh uns, swe þatei instandai dags Xristaus.

2THESS 2.3 ni ƕashun izwis usluto ƕamma haidau, unte niba qimiþ afstass faurþis, jah andhulids wairþai manna frawaurhtais, sunus fralustais, 2THESS 2.4 sa andstandands jah ufarhafjands sik ufar all qiþanana guþ aiþþau blotinassu, swaei ina in alh gudis gasitan, ...

2THESS 2.16 aþþan silba frauja unsar Iesus Xristus jah guþ jah atta unsar saei frijoda uns jah atgaf gaþlaiht aiweina jah wen goda in anstai, 2THESS 2.17 gaþrafstjai hairtona izwara jah gatulgjai in allaim waurstwam jah waurdam godaim.
2THESS 3.1 þata anþar gabidjaiþ jah bi unsis, broþrjus, ei waurd fraujins þragjai jah mikiljaidau, swaswe jah at izwis, 2THESS 3.2 jah ei uslausjaindau af gastojanaim jah ubilaim mannam;
2THESS 3.3 aþþan triggws frauja saei gatulgeiþ izwis jah galausjai izwis af þamma ubilin.
2THESS 3.4 aþþan gatrauam in fraujin in izwis, ei þatei anabudum izwis, jah taujiþ jah taujan habaiþ.
2THESS 3.5 ak frauja garaihtjai hairtona izwara in friaþwai gudis jah in usþulainai Xristaus.
2THESS 3.6 aþþan anabiudam izwis, broþrjus, in namin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, ei gaskaidaiþ izwis af allamma broþre ƕairbandane ungatassaba jah ni bi anafilham þoei andnemuþ at uns.

...2THESS 3.7 ist galeikon unsis, unte ni ungatewidai wesum in izwis, 2THESS 3.8 nih arwjo hlaib matidedum at ƕamma, ak winnandans in arbaidai naht jah daga waurkjandans, ei ni kauridedeima ƕana izwara.
